thread.title: Lionel Messi did not celebrate Barcelona’s winner because he was ‘upset with fans for booing’
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi did not celebrate Barcelona’s winner because he was ‘upset with fans for booing’

author: ashilton
title: Lionel Messi did not celebrate Barcelona’s winner because he was ‘upset with fans for booing’
text:
Relieved to have escaped the shackles of Marco Verratti , Messi was back in business at the weekend. AP:Associated Press Messi fires in a last-minute penalty against Leganes Lionel Messi makes his teammates look like amateurs in Barcelona training Getty Images 5 Messi was unimpressed with the treatment he got from Nou Camp fans 
He netted twice to send Barca back to within a point of leaders Real Madrid, who have two games in hand. 
Messi netted an injury-time winner from the spot against Leganes but appear far from happy to have got team back to winning ways. Reuters Edgardo Bauza reckons that Messi was furious over his treatment Related stories Saint-Etienne vs Manchester United: What is the team news for the Europa League tie? Former West Ham and Tottenham ace Fredi Kanoute in line to be the new boss of his home nation Mali gambling quiz Football Association to probe Wayne Shaw to see if pie-eating Sutton reserve keeper broke betting rules BROTHERLY SHOVE Paul Pogba's brother tells why he begged midfielder to quit Man Utd for Juve in 2012 Bros battle Florentin Pogba: The Saint-Etienne centre-half who will share a pitch with his brother Paul at Old Trafford Preview Manchester City vs Monaco: When is the Champions League tie and what TV channel is it on? Preview What time does Bayer Leverkusen vs Atletico Madrid in the Champions League kick off and what TV channel is it on? Getty Images Messi looked incredulous at Barca players' treatment 
And Bauza reckons it was because the 29-year-old is unhappy with the stick he's taken. 
Bauza said: "I think he reacted to the criticism he may have received after PSG. 
"I noticed he was very angry when he scored the goals." Barcelona boss Luis Enrique restrained by THREE people as he lashes out at reporter
